doc.after: It was a period of great demand for John Kemp Starley s new safety bicycles Pneumatic Tyre began cycle tyre production in Belfast in late 1890 and quickly expanded to fill consumer demand However in 1890 J B Dunlop s patent was withdrawn It had been discovered that Robert William Thomson had first patented the pneumatic tyre in 1845 1 J B Dunlop and Harvey du Cros together worked through the ensuing considerable difficulties They employed inventor Charles Kingston Welch and also acquired other rights and patents which allowed them to protect their business s position to some extent 5
